Ankylosing spondylitis is a type of *rheumatoid arthritis* that generally starts at the SIJ and progresses to the spinal joints and/or hip joints @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020.

Onset can be from 15-40years @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020

No change in risk based on gender @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020


# Exercise

::: {.callout}
See ch5 @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020
:::

- Maintain mobility of involved joints @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020
    - Breathing exercises
    - Spinal extension based movements
    - Peripheral joint AROM
- Lie prone for 5 minutes multiple times per day to promote extension @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020


# Lifestyle modifications

## Sleep

- Hard mattress @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020
- Avoid sidelying @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020


## Exercise

Swimming is one of the best sports for patients with {{< meta title >}} @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020
